WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

I create some Updates and they are visible in the WSUS-Console. After remove them with WPP the empty Product and Vendor are not removed. 

It is possible that WPP removes the complete Groups?

Thanks!

Comments.Message:
Did you rightclick on "delete product" (Adobe Reader)?

Bye
Norbert

Hi Dusselritter, 
you will need to run WPP on the Wsus server. Then go to Tools -> Settings -> 'Server' Tab
   - Ensure that the 'Connect to local server' checkbox is checked.
   - In the 'When publishing a new update' section choose either 'Let me choose' or 'Always make this update visible in the Wsus Console'.

Select the 'Empty Product', right-click on it and choose 'Delete Product'. You will be able to delete only Product with 0 update in it.
(See the attached screenshot)
